Name: Verify Access to Myti Dashboard and Checkout Profile Web Addresses
Description: Navigate to the checkout profile web tax add page and access the Myti dashboard. From the dashboard, navigate to the checkout profile web addresses page. Verify that the pageCheckoutprofileWebAddresses is accessible.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://www-int.itg.ti.com/checkoutprofile/web/tax/add
step 2: Click on link 'myTI dashboard'
step 3: Click on link 'myTI dashboard' -> Navigate to page 'checkoutprofile/web/addresses'
step 4: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
